texto: minimization of the potential impact of the use of, natural resources. 4 The organization recognizes its responsibility to society for managing natural resources. The organization has implemented some best practices in its current application of natural resources. 5 The organization recognizes its responsibility to society for managing natural resources related to the life cycle of products and services. The managing of natural resources is widespread in all the areas of the organization. The organization addresses both current and future use of natural resources required by its processes. The organization is aware of new trends and technologies for the efficient use of natural resources,
